Export.Routine:
WWWDRAGDROP10 ;WWWDRAGDROP10;FIS;DARSTELLEN DRAG AND DROP ELEMENTE;18.09.2003 ;EINSPRUNG AUS WWWDRAGDROP ! ;out of ;--------------------------- SET TERMIN="" SET STUNDE=0 SET DAUER=0 IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,21)'="" IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,22)'="" DO . SET TERMIN=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,21)) ;START FERTIGUNGSTERMIN ;take-off . QUIT:TERMIN="" . SET UHRZEIT=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,33)) ;UHRZEIT FERTIGUNGSSTART . SET STUNDE=0 . IF +UHRZEIT'=0 IF +$GET(ARBBEGINN)'=0 IF UHRZEIT>ARBBEGINN SET STUNDE=$JUSTIFY(((UHRZEIT-ARBBEGINN)/60/60),0,0) . IF STUNDE'0 DO . . . NEW DESCCOLOR . . . SET DESCCOLOR="" . . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . . ;SET YZA=0 ;table-mat . . . ;SET YNUM="" FOR SET YNUM=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM)) QUIT:YNUM="" DO . . . ;.SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM,1)) . . . ;.IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)'=1 QUIT . . . ;.SET YZA=YZA+1 . . . ;.QUIT . . . QUIT:YZA=0 . . . SET YA=0 . . . SET YZAMAX=(HEADLAENG*PIXEL) ;max. header breite ;breadth . . . WRITE YCR,"" ;BEC;21.10.03 . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . SET YNUM="" . . . FOR SET YNUM=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM)) QUIT:YNUM="" DO . . . . SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM,1)) . . . . ;IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,5)=1 DO ;ANZEIGEN . . . . IF $PIECE(YSETUP,Y,YNUM)=1 DO ;ANZEIGEN ;give notice ;display . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,19)'="" DO ;EXECUTE VOR ANZEIGE FELDINHALT ;EXECUTE pre- Show . . . . . . NEW YINHALT,YEXEC . . . . . . SET YEXEC=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,19) . . . . . . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) . . . . . . DO . . . . . . . NEW (YEXEC,YINHALT,SPRACHE,LANGUAGE,Y,YUCI,YM,YBED,YUSER,YFORM,YDATEI,YLOCATION) . . . . . . . XECUTE YEXEC . . . . . . ; . . . . . . SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)=YINHALT . . . . . ; . . . . . SET HEADER="" . . . . . ;IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)="" SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)=" " . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,9)="" SET HEADER=$$^WWWTR(0,+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,2),$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)) . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,9)'="" DO ;RELATIONSDATEI VORHANDEN ;on hand . . . . . . NEW RELK,RELF,YI,YDATEI,YDATEI1,YINHALT . . . . . . SET DESCCOLOR="" . . . . . . SET YDATEI=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,9) . . . . . . SET RELK=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,10) ;RELATIONS PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL . . . . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" IF '$FIND($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""") SET $PIECE(RELK,",",YI)=""""_@$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)_"""" . . . . . . SET RELF=+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,11) ;ANZEIGE FELD ;Show field . . . . . . IF RELF=0 SET RELF=1 . . . . . . IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)'="" DO . . . . . . . SET YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_"""" . . . . . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","_""""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""")_"""" . . . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,14)'=1 SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","_""""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"""")_"""" . . . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,14)=1 DO . . . . . . . . NEW TRENN . . . . . . . . SET TRENN=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,15) . . . . . . . . IF TRENN="" SET TRENN="," . . . . . . . . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),TRENN,YI)="" SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","_""""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),TRENN,YI),"""")_"""" . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_",1)" . . . . . . . IF YDATEI="INAUFPT" IF +$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"-",3)=0 DO ;!!! SONDERFALL PRODUKTIONSPLANUNG . . . . . . . . SET YDATEI1="^INAUFP("_""""_YM_""""_","_""""_$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"-",1)_""""_","_$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"-",2)_",1)" . . . . . . . . ;;SET $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)=$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"-",1)_"-"_$PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"-",2) . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . IF '$DATA(@YDATEI1) QUIT . . . . . . . SET HEADER=$PIECE(@YDATEI1,Y,RELF) ;EINSETZEN RELATIONSWERT ;stow . . . . . . . IF YDATEI="INPARA"!(YDATEI="WWW101") DO . . . . . . . . IF $TRANSLATE($PIECE($GET(@YDATEI1),Y,2)," ")'="" SET DESCCOLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,$PIECE((@YDATEI1),Y,2),1)),Y,1) . . . . . . ; . . . . . . IF HEADER="" SET HEADER=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) . . . . . . QUIT . . . . . IF HEADER="" SET HEADER=" " . . . . . SET YA=YA+1 . . . . . SET YZASIZE=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,16) ;FELDBREITE . . . . . IF +YZASIZE=0 SET YZASIZE=4*PIXEL ;DFLT. BREITE ;width . . . . . ;IF +YZASIZE=0 SET YZASIZE=$JUSTIFY((HEADLAENG*PIXEL)/YZA,0,0) ;DFLT. BREITE . . . . . SET YZASIZE=(YZASIZE\PIXEL)*PIXEL . . . . . IF YA=YZA SET YZASIZE=YZAMAX ;RESTBREITE . . . . . SET YZAMAX=YZAMAX-YZASIZE ;RESTL. BREITE ;width . . . . . IF YZAMAX<0 QUIT . . . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . ; . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . WRITE YCR,"
1 WRITE " border-left:1px solid "_COLORDARK_";" . . . . . IF YA'=YZA WRITE " width:"_YZASIZE_";" . . . . . IF YA=YZA WRITE " width:"_(YZASIZE-2)_";" . . . . . WRITE " height:"_(PIXEL-2)_";" . . . . . ;WRITE " z-index:99999;" . . . . . WRITE " overflow:hidden;" . . . . . WRITE " white-space:nowrap;" . . . . . IF DESCCOLOR'="" WRITE " background-color:"_DESCCOLOR_";" . . . . . WRITE """"_">" . . . . . WRITE " " . . . . . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,38)=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,12)=1 IF $GET(YPRINTMODE)'=1 DO ;SORTIERFELD . . . . . . WRITE "" . . . . . ; . . . . . IF YNUM=$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40) IF $DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"GRENZE",$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40))) DO ;AUSLASTUNGSGRENZE . . . . . . NEW GRUPPE,ANZEIGE,DAT . . . . . . SET ANZEIGE=0 . . . . . . SET GRUPPE=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40)) ;GRUPPE ;group . . . . . . SET DAT=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"GRENZE",$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40),START),-1) . . . . . . IF DAT'="" IF GRUPPE'="" FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"GRENZE",$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40),DAT)) QUIT:DAT="" QUIT:DAT>STOP DO QUIT:ANZEIGE=1 . . . . . . . IF $GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"GRENZE",$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40),DAT,GRUPPE))<$GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"AUSLAST",$PIECE(CHART1,Y,40),DAT,GRUPPE)) SET ANZEIGE=1 . . . . . . ; . . . . . . IF ANZEIGE'=1 QUIT . . . . . . WRITE "" . . . . . ; . . . . . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,25)=1 SET HEADER=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) ;NUR KEY ANZEIGEN ;only KEY display . . . . . IF HEADER'=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,2)=6 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)'=1 SET HEADER=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)_" "_HEADER . . . . . IF $GET(YPRINTMODE)=1 IF +FONTSIZE'=0 SET HEADER=$EXTRACT(HEADER,1,(YZASIZE/FONTSIZE)) ;FIS;07.01.04;24441 . . . . . ; . . . . . IF YZASIZE'>PIXEL SET HEADER=$EXTRACT(HEADER) . . . . . WRITE $$^WWWTRANSLATE(HEADER," "," ") . . . . . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,38)=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,12)=1 IF $GET(YPRINTMODE)'=1 WRITE "" . . . . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . . WRITE YCR,"
" . ; . NEW TOOLID,TOPPOS,LEFTPOS,TOOLTIP . SET TOOLTIP="" . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,30)=1 DO . . SET TOOLTIP="" . . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,29)'="" SET TOOLTIP=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,29)) . . SET TOOLID="tool"_$TRANSLATE(KEY,"-.","__") . . IF KEY2'="" SET TOOLID=TOOLID_"%s%"_KEY2 . . SET TOPPOS=((LINE*PIXEL)+PIXEL+2+BUTTONLINE) . . SET LEFTPOS=((HEADLAENG*PIXEL)+(TERMIN*TIMESIZE*PIXEL)+PIXEL+2) . . IF TOOLTIP'="" DO ^WWWTOOLTIP(TOOLTIP,TOPPOS,LEFTPOS,TOOLID,"move") . ; . ;ELEMENT ;Balken ;medium girder . ;======= . SET YFELDNAME=$TRANSLATE(KEY,".-","__") . IF KEY2'="" SET YFELDNAME=YFELDNAME_"%s%"_KEY2 . ; . ;VERSTECKTER BALKEN ZUR GRÖSSENÄNDERUNG ;girder . ;-------------------------------------- . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,62)=1 IF $GET(YPRINTMODE)'=1 DO . . NEW NOMOVE . . SET NOMOVE=0 . . IF TERMIN=START IF STUNDE=0 SET NOMOVE=1 ;START AUSSERHALB SKALA ;take-off scale . . IF DAUER2=0 SET NOMOVE=1 ;AUSSERHALB SKALA ;scale . . ;IF DAUER2=(COLUMNS-HEADLAENG-(TERMIN*TIMESIZE)-STUNDE) SET NOMOVE=1 ;ENDE AUSSERHALB SKALA ;table-mat termination scale . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR," " . . WRITE "
" . ; . ;FARBIGER BALKEN ;girder . ;--------------- . WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE YCR," " . DO . . IF +$PIECE(CHART1,Y,68)'=0 DO QUIT ;DATENFELD BESCHRIFTUNG . . . WRITE $PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,68)) . . . QUIT . . IF +$PIECE(CHART1,Y,54)'=0 IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,54))=1 DO QUIT ;FÜR BERECHNUNG GESPERRT ;to DISABLED . . . NEW MERKER . . . SET MERKER=$PIECE($GET(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,54),1)),Y,1) . . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW1221(0,CHART,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,54),SPRACHE,1)),Y,1)'="" SET MERKER=$PIECE(^(1),Y,1) . . . IF ((DAUER2*PIXEL)-3/FONTSIZE)<10 WRITE ""_$EXTRACT(MERKER)_"" QUIT . . . WRITE ""_MERKER_"" . . . QUIT . . IF DAUER2'=0 DO . . . IF '$DATA(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DATENn",KEY)) DO QUIT . . . . IF ((DAUER2*PIXEL)/FONTSIZE)'<8 WRITE $$^WWWTIME(DAUERX) . . . ; . . . IF KEY2'="" WRITE "("_(KEY2)_") " . . . IF ((DAUER2*PIXEL)-3/FONTSIZE)'<8 WRITE $$^WWWTIME(DAUERX) . . ; . . IF DAUER2=0 IF DAUER'=0 WRITE $$^WWWTIME(DAUERX) . . IF DAUER2=0 IF DAUER=0 WRITE "X" . ; . WRITE "
" . ; . ;AUSLASTUNGSANZEIGE (BALKEN IN BALKEN) ;within . ;------------------------------------- . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,66)=1 IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,65)'="" DO ;DATENFELD GENUTZTE RESSOURECN ;data item . . NEW DAUER3,DAUER4 . . SET DAUER3=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,65)) . . SET DAUER4=$PIECE(DAUER3,"#",2) ;DAUER ZWISCHEN START UND BEGINN DER RESSOURCE . . SET DAUER3=$PIECE(DAUER3,"#",1) ;DAUER DER RESSOURCE . . QUIT:+DAUER'>0 . . IF +$PIECE(CHART1,Y,67)'=1 DO . . . SET DAUER3=$JUSTIFY((DAUER3/60/60),0,1) ;IN STUNDEN ;within procrastinate . . . IF UHR'=1 SET DAUER3=(DAUER3\ARBSTUNDEN) ;IF DAUER3#ARBSTUNDEN'=0 SET DAUER3=DAUER3+1 ;table-mat . . ; . . IF +DAUER3'>0 QUIT . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR," " . . WRITE "
" . ; . ;EDIT ELEMENT ;Bearbeitungsfenster innerhalb Seite ;medium inside Side . ;============ . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,45)'=1 IF KEY2="" DO . . IF CHART'="" IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,14)=1 DO . . . NEW YFELD,YNUM,SIZE,YTYP,YFELDNAME,PTOP,PLEFT,YDATEI . . . SET SIZE=+$PIECE(CHART1,Y,28) ;SCHRIFTGRÖSSE BEARBEITUNGSFENSTER IN PIXEL ;within . . . IF +SIZE=0 SET SIZE=8 . . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . . ; . . . WRITE "
" SET DAUER=+$GET(DAUER2) QUIT
